00029 #ifndef SC_OBJECT_INT_H_INCLUDED_
00030 #define SC_OBJECT_INT_H_INCLUDED_
00031 
00032 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_object.h"
00033 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_module.h"
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_simcontext_int.h"
00035 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_phase_callback_registry.h"
00036 
00037 namespace sc_core {
00038 
00039 class sc_object::hierarchy_scope
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     explicit hierarchy_scope(sc_object* obj);
00043     explicit hierarchy_scope(sc_module* mod);
00044     ~hierarchy_scope();
00045 
00046 private:
00047     sc_module * scope_;
00048 
00049 private:
00050     hierarchy_scope( hierarchy_scope const & other ) /* = delete */;
00051     hierarchy_scope& operator=(hierarchy_scope const&) /* = delete */;
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 inline
00056 sc_object::hierarchy_scope::hierarchy_scope( sc_object* obj )
00057   : scope_(0)
00058 {
00059     if( !obj ) return;
00060 
00061     scope_ = dynamic_cast<sc_module*>(obj);
00062     if( !scope_ )
00063         scope_ = dynamic_cast<sc_module*>(obj->get_parent_object());
00064     if( scope_ )
00065         scope_->simcontext()->hierarchy_push(scope_);
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 inline
00070 sc_object::hierarchy_scope::hierarchy_scope( sc_module* mod )
00071   : scope_(mod)
00072 {
00073     if( scope_ )
00074         scope_->simcontext()->hierarchy_push(scope_);
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 inline
00079 sc_object::hierarchy_scope::~hierarchy_scope()
00080 {
00081     if( scope_ )
00082         scope_->simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 
00088 inline void
00089 sc_object::do_simulation_phase_callback()
00090 {
00091     simulation_phase_callback();
00092 }
00093 
00094 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 
00096 } // namespace sc_core
